SELECT p.postId, p.company, p.contactInformation, p.contacts, p.Position_name, p.post_title, p.recruitmentNumber, p.sendPostDate, e.enterpriseId, e.enterpriseAddress, e.enterpriseIcon, e.enterpriseIntroduction, e.enterpriseName, e.enterpriseScale, e.enterpriseTypeId, e.industry_Name, et.enterpriseTypeID, et.enterpriseTypeName, r.CompanyBenefits, r.EducationalRequirements, r.JobContent, r.JobRequirements, r.JobType, r.postId, r.RecruitmentDetailsId, r.salary, rt.recruitmentDetailsTypeId, rt.recruitmentDetailsTypeName, pb.postId, pb.postBrowseId, pb.browse_user, u.userName, u.`PASSWORD`, u.token, u.userid, u.userType FROM ezd_post p LEFT JOIN ezd_enterprise e ON p.`company` = e.`enterpriseId` LEFT JOIN ezd_enterprisetype et ON e.`enterpriseTypeId` = et.`enterpriseTypeID` LEFT JOIN ezd_recruitmentdetails r ON p.`postId` = r.`postId` LEFT JOIN ezd_recruitmentdetailstype rt ON r.`JobType` = rt.`recruitmentDetailsTypeId` LEFT JOIN ezd_postbrowse pb ON p.`postId` = pb.`postId` LEFT JOIN ezd_users u ON pb.`postBrowseId` = u.`userid` WHERE p.`postId` = #{psotId}
